function.name: dns_record_lookup_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "View all configured DNS records (A, MX, CNAME etc.) for a specified domain name."

domain.description: the domain name to lookup DNS records for

recordtype.description: the type of DNS record you wish to retrieve (default 'ANY')

function.name: ping_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Test how long a response from remote system takes to reach the ViewDNS server. Useful for detecting latency issues on network connections."

host.description: the domain or IP address to perform a ping on

function.name: ip_location_finder_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This tool will display geographic information about a supplied IP address including city, country, latitude, longitude and more."

ip.description: the ip address to find the location of

function.name: chinese_firewall_test_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Checks whether a site is blocked by the Great Firewall of China. function.name: spam_database_lookup_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Find out if your mail server is listed in any spam databases."

ip.description: the IP address to test for spam blacklisting

function.name: free_email_lookup_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Find out if a domain name provides free email addresses. Search is performed on a custom made list of thousands of known free email hosts."

domain.description: the domain name to test for free email services

function.name: mac_address_lookup_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This tool will display the name of the company that manufactured a specific network device based on its MAC Address."

function.name: abuse_contact_lookup_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Used to find the abuse contact address for a domain name. This is where you would send complaints about spam originating from that domain."

domain.description: the domain name to find the abuse contact for

function.name: dns_propagation_checker_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Check whether recent changes to DNS entries have propagated to DNS servers all over the world. Useful in troubleshooting DNS issues that appear to be isolated to one geographic region. Provides a status report on DNS propagation globally."

function.name: iran_firewall_test_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Test if any website is accessible using the Internet in Iran in real-time."

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: Please perform a ping test on the domain 'google.com' and let me know the response time in JSON format. Additionally, check if the domain 'microsoft.com' is blocked by the Great Firewall of China. Provide the result in XML format.
